subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The Predators’ Shea Weber has few fans in Detroit after a hit on Red Wings forward Henrik Zetterberg in a playoff series that Nashville leads, 2-1.
snippet: The Predators’ Shea Weber has few fans in Detroit after a hit on Red Wings forward Henrik Zetterberg in a playoff series that Nashville leads, 2-1.
